suggestions: All notices, requests, waivers, and other communications under this Confidentiality Agreement must be in writing and are deemed to have been duly given as follows: (i) when hand-delivered to the other Party; (ii) upon receipt if sent by electronic mail to the email address set forth in the signature block below, provided that the sending Party obtains confirmation of delivery; (iii) three (3) business days after mailing via the U.S. mail, using first class or certified mail with receipt requested, postage prepaid, and addressed to the other Party at the address provided below; or (iv) forty-eight (48) hours after deposit with an internationally recognized overnight delivery service, postage prepaid and addressed to the other Party as shown below, provided that the sender obtains confirmation of delivery from the service provider. A Party may update its address or electronic mail information by providing the other Party with written notice of the new details in accordance with the procedures set forth above.
